title: Global leading countries in wine export 2018 , based on volume
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in million hectoliters in the y axis.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.
There is a difference of 18.4 between the maximum Country Spain and minimum Country New Zealand.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in million hectoliters in each Country on the y axis.
Country Spain has the highest Export volume in million hectoliters and New Zealand has the lowest Export volume in million hectoliters.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in million hectoliters in the y axis.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.
There is a difference of 18.4 between the maximum Country Spain and minimum Country New Zealand.
max_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in million hectoliters in each Country on the y axis.
Country Spain has the highest Export volume in million hectoliters and New Zealand has the lowest Export volume in million hectoliters.
The second highest Export volume in million hectoliters is appeared to be the Country Italy.
The difference of Export volume in million hectoliters between the highest and lowest Country is 18.4.
Country Spain is higher than any other Countrys with value 21.0, followed by Italy, and France. Down to Country New Zealand with the lowest value 2.6.
Considered together, the average Export volume in million hectoliters in all 11 Countrys is roughly 8.42.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is 92.6 if we add up values of all Countrys.
